text: So, we are trying to connect an app and retrieve call notes from HubSpot, by using Private Apps. We have created a webhook for the latter and the HubSpot support insist that there should be an event type for this under contact object type. But there is not and so he send us here. Please help. We want tot retrieve the written notes inside a Call activity, when the call note is created.
This might be in Conversation Object instead of Contact
Thank you very much for adding something to this, we thought the same, but it is not. HubSpot support says the option is missing.
do you guys see certain drop in GA4 users sessions in a last few days on your websites? it may be connected with Consent Mode of Google
I agree, do you have any screenshots that you can share?
Thank you. What is the source of this report?
Okay, I get it. So it's a custom report from your own homegrown application.
Yes, that's why I'm asking if I can use HubSpot UI extensions within my report.
